message.body: all is well on the caberet front:) i hope to visit vt this summer; it'd be cool to catch up on all things! Hugs to you and Ria!
Hey G! Sorry i missed a chance to hang out while in btv:). Just wanted to send a huge nola thanks for eveything! Your friendship has meant a lot! I Hope
No worries. You're the best Marianne. Have great adventures and let me know all about em
